org.bitbucket.jrsofty.parser.logging.api

Interface LogParserFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LogParserFactory.DefaultLogParserFactory

    public interface LogParserFactory
    Interface for creating LogParserFactory implementations.
    Author:
    jrsofty

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LogParserFactory.DefaultLogParserFactory 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LogParserFactory createDefaultInstance()
      Provides the default parser factory.
      LogParser createParserForFormat(String format, Class<?> clazz)
      Creates an instance of the LogParser Implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • createDefaultInstance

        static LogParserFactory createDefaultInstance()
        Provides the default parser factory.
        Returns:
        the DefaultLogParserFactory implementation of this interface.

      • createParserForFormat

        LogParser createParserForFormat(String format,
                                Class<?> clazz)
                         throws LogLineFormatException,
                                IllegalClassException
        Creates an instance of the LogParser Implementation.
        Parameters:
        format - a String with the formatting tokens for describing the expected log line format to match.
        clazz - a class that has implemented the LogEntry interface and has fields mapped with the LogElementMapping annotations matching the tokens in the format param.
        Returns:
        An instance of the LogParser.
        Throws:
        LogLineFormatException - when the formatting tokens are invalid or cannot be used.
        IllegalClassException - when the class object cannot be instanced, or reflected, or when the LogElementMapping annotations are missing.
